items.content_html: # Express Framework Express is a fast, minimal, and flexible Node.js web application framework. It provides robust features for building web and mobile apps, including routing, middleware, and HTTP utilities. **Features**: - Simple routing. - Middleware support. - Scalable and lightweight.
items.title: Felix-Otieno/The-Express-JavaScript-Framework: # Express Framework  Express is a fast, minimal, and flexible Node.js web application framework. It provides robust features for building web and mobile apps, including routing, middleware, and HTTP utilities.    **Features**:   - Simple routing.   - Middleware support.   - Scalable and lightweight.

items.content_html: onlyjs is a lightweight JavaScript library for fast and easy UI development. It allows you to quickly create, style, and render HTML elements with minimal code, making DOM manipulation effortless and efficient.
